narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this re-license inspection of site 001. 
 
This is a 1st re-license inspection for a Class C license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility 
representative. This site is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part once site 002 completes and passes a 
re-license inspection. If you have not received your license within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478.
